plot: In September, Colorado's Front Range area was hit by an unprecendented rainfall and massive floods. This short shows the impact on fracked wells in Weld County, home to the highest density of oil and gas wells in the US.
title: H2Oil (Postcard from Weld County)
plot_es: In September, Colorado's Front Range area was hit by an unprecendented rainfall and massive floods. This short shows the impact on fracked wells in Weld County, home to the highest density of oil and gas wells in the US.
plot_en: In September, Colorado's Front Range area was hit by an unprecendented rainfall and massive floods. This short shows the impact on fracked wells in Weld County, home to the highest density of oil and gas wells in the US.
